name: The Crooked Voice
description:
You wake up in the rural cottage you're staying in with your family, but the atmosphere is rare. Suddenly, you hear the objects around you talking out loud. Your family is gone, everyone is gone. You are alone, isolated and locked down surrounded by snowy mountains.

As you explore the house, you start to understand what has happened. You must listen carefully to what the house itself has to say.  But then everything starts to transform unexpectedly. 

Sometimes it is hard to distinguish dreams from reality. All of the sudden, a place we used to know  is twisted and warped. As for ourselves, it seems our own body has transformed and adopted unexpected sizes and forms. 

Then, all we long for is to find a way out. 

But who is the one to tell which perspective is real? When do nightmares really end?

Credits for the house voice: uberduck.ai
